original_text: I saw also that the temple had a raised platform all around; the foundations of the side chambers measured a full reed of six long cubits.
korean_text: 내가 보니 성전 삼면의 지대 곧 모든 골방 밑 지대의 높이는 한 장대 곧 큰 자로 여섯 척인데

sentences.original_text: that the temple had a raised platform all around
sentences.korean_translation: 성전에 사방으로 높은 단이 있는 것을

sentences.original_text: the foundations of the side chambers measured
a full reed of six long cubits
